subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
Parental Consent for Vaccination Act

This bill stipulates that any COVID-19 vaccine mandate issued by Congress or an executive agency must require the written, informed consent of a legal guardian when a COVID-19 vaccine is administered to an individual under the age of 18.
